attributes.action: proposed changes to contribution based esa claims
attributes.additional_details: why should anyone who has paid ni contributions for over 30 yrs, now be penalised, when those who have never paid a penny, will continue to receive esa, without any problem. and if the changes come in next april i will no longer be able to claim esa, because my husband works. this is wrong i have worked for over 36 yrs and paid full taxes, yet am being penalised. makes me wonder why i worked, should have stayed on benefits and had a large number of children. please reconsider this mr cable. your penalising the wrong people, i had to stop work because of my health, that was the only reason,
